title: Profiles of International Companies
story: KPD Foods Bruno Silva Head of Marketing Address: Avenida Paulista 53, Bela Vista, São Paulo, 01311-914, Brazil Tel: (+55) 11 8134 7706 Email: bruno.silva@KPDFoods.com Getty Telecommunications Ltd Olivia Hoskins International Project Manager Address: 700 Rockville Street, Monroe, New York 10950, USA Tel: (+1) 845 228 8396 Email: Olivia.Hoskins@GettyTel.com Orion Education Services Park Ji-Yeon Director Address: South Korea, Seoul, Jongno-gu, Sajik-ro-3-gil 23, 30174 Tel: (+82) 2 235-6482 Email: Jiyeon_Park@OrionEducation.com ABC Travel Rashid Khan Sales Representative Address: Hajar Road, Dubai, UAE Tel: (+971) 4 677 3355 Email: Rashid.Khan@ABCTravelDubai.com
summary: Learn about the key players in the international business world including KPD Foods, Getty Telecommunications Ltd, Orion Education Services, and ABC Travel, and find their contact information.
image: The image could be a collage of the logos of the four companies.
